data.feedback: Excellent architecture design with verified file paths. Modern Flutter patterns (get_it, Dio, sealed classes, interface segregation). All filesToModify exist, all filesToCreate don't exist. Minor API endpoint mismatches are acceptable for foundation epic.

issues.description: api_endpoints.dart proposes /auth/logout but backend has no logout endpoint
issues.recommendation: Developer should remove or comment out logout endpoint until backend adds it
Developer should use /auth/me for user profile endpoint

suggestions: Add /auth/me endpoint constant to align with backend
Consider documenting which endpoints are placeholders for future backend work
